Record.ClassificationPath: Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Retroviridae Infections/Lentivirus Infections/Pneumonia, Progressive Interstitial, of Sheep
Virus Diseases/Slow Virus Diseases/Pneumonia, Progressive Interstitial, of Sheep
Animal Diseases/Sheep Diseases/Pneumonia, Progressive Interstitial, of Sheep
Record.Description: Chronic respiratory disease caused by the VISNA-MAEDI VIRUS. It was formerly believed to be identical with jaagsiekte (PULMONARY ADENOMATOSIS, OVINE) but is now recognized as a separate entity.
